title: Spiced pork fillet
ingredients: ['110g (4 oz) butter', '3 large onions, minced', '1.5kg (3 1/2 lb) pork fillet', '1/2 small bottle tomato ketchup', 'juice from 1 lemon', '1 1/2 tablespoons vinegar', '85g (3 oz) soft brown sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3 teaspoons prepared mustard', 'several dashes Worcestershire sauce', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '300ml (1/2 pt) water']
